Stately
,
plump
Buck
Mulligan
came
from
the
stairhead
,
bearing
a

of
*NL*
lather
on
which
a

and

lay
crossed
.
A
yellow
dressinggown
,
*NL*
ungirdled

on

air
.

*NL*
held

*NL*
*NL*
--
_

ad

.

*NL*

*NL*

Come

Kinch
!
Come

*NL*

faced
about
